children.name: rich_text
children.label: Rich text
children.default: Express yourself freely in this rich text field. Write engaging and informative content to captivate your audience. Let your creativity shine as you convey your ideas clearly. Showcase your copywriting skills and create outstanding content for this webpage.

default.rich_text: Express yourself freely in this rich text field. Write engaging and informative content to captivate your audience. Let your creativity shine as you convey your ideas clearly. Showcase your copywriting skills and create outstanding content for this webpage.

name: custom_id
label: Custom ID
inline_help_text: If set, it must be unique on the page. For example `hero_section` can be targeted using example.com#hero_section.
